about_the_game:
Step into the ultimate 2D space arena where strategy meets action in Astro Arena! In this fast-paced, team-based game, two opposing teams clash in a dynamic battleground, each vying for dominance with a unique twist on the classic rock-paper-scissors game you know and love.

Choose your character type—Rock, Paper, or Scissors—and dive into the fray. Each type has its strengths and weaknesses: chase down the enemy characters you're strong against, and evade those who have the upper hand over you. The key to victory lies in outmaneuvering your opponents and using your environment to your advantage.

But it’s not just about the chase! As you battle it out, gather valuable resources scattered across the arena to gain the upper hand. Earn points for every successful match and exchange them for powerful abilities like invisibility, speed boosts, and more. These abilities can be activated for a short time during the game, giving you the edge you need to turn the tide of battle.

Formulate your team’s strategy, coordinate with your allies, and outplay your opponents to claim victory in this adrenaline-pumping battle royale. Will you lead your team to triumph or crumble under the pressure?

Astro Arena is a fresh take on the classic game, offering hours of competitive fun. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and dominate the arena?

Features:
  • Classic Rock-Paper-Scissors Mechanics: Experience a thrilling twist on the timeless game.
  • Team-Based Battles: Work with your team to outmaneuver and outsmart the opposition.
  • Dynamic 2D Space Arena: Explore and fight in a vibrant, action-packed battleground.
  • Resource Gathering: Collect and strategically use resources to gain the upper hand.
  • Ability Upgrades: Earn points and unlock powerful abilities like invisibility and speed boosts to activate during battle.
  • Intense Multiplayer Action: Engage in high-octane battles with friends or players around the world.

Prepare for battle, strategize with your team, and may the best team win in Astro Arena!

name: Astro Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Astro Arena is a fast-paced, team-based space battleground where Rock, Paper, and Scissors clash. Choose your character, gather resources, and earn points to unlock powerful abilities like invisibility and speed. Outsmart your opponents and lead your team to victory!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Ukrainian, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
